trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the scope of the progress changed event such as for an entire multiple document sequence, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: 指定進度已變更事件範圍的列舉值，例如整個多文件順序、單一文件或單一頁面。

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope defined by <c>writingLevel</c>, the number of documents or the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <c>writingLevel</c> 所定義的範圍，已寫入的文件數目或頁數。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of data that has been written.
The user-supplied object that identifies the write operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可識別寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The user-supplied `state` parameter is the object passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method that identifies the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供`state`參數是傳遞至物件<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>方法，以識別非同步寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 取得已序列化的文件或頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages that have been written at the time of the event.
trans-unit.target: 在發生事件時寫入的文件或頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>指定已寫入的文件數目。

trans-unit.source: For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 如需所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>是已寫入的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the writing progress.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示寫入進度的範圍。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of writing a multiple document sequence, a single document, or single page.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別，指出寫入多個文件序列、單一文件或單一頁面的範圍。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property specifies the number of documents that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>屬性會指定已寫入的文件數目。

trans-unit.source: For all other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A> cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A> property is the number of pages that have been written.
trans-unit.target: 如需所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>屬性是已寫入的頁面數目。
